@aspirations345 

You really do not understand how dillution works...and $AAPL does not have trillions of shares 

When a company increases their share count by a factor of 8x in just a few months, that is bad for share holders...if you bought before the dillution your shares are now worth 1/8th of what they would have been with no dillution. 

This is a classic penny stock pump and dump tactic, get some news to maje investors excited then dillute.like crazy while the stock is hot. This why many smart investors are skeptical of $MULN
